data.title: Glamping Dalhalla, Rättvik (updated prices 2024)
data.meta_description: Glamping Dalhalla, a property with a terrace, is situated in Rättvik, 500 metres from Dalhalla Amphitheatre, 39 km from Vasaloppet Museum, as well as 31 km...
data.text:
Glamping Dalhalla, a property with a terrace, is situated in Rättvik, 500 metres from Dalhalla Amphitheatre, 39 km from Vasaloppet Museum, as well as 31 km from Dala Horse Museum. The luxury tent, housed in a building dating from 2022, is 39 km from the Zorn Museum. Towels and bed linen are available in the luxury tent. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, vegetarian and vegan options. The nearest airport is Mora Airport, 48 km from the luxury tent.

Distance in property description is calculated using © OpenStreetMap

Please inform Glamping Dalhalla in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
